Mortgage, insurance etc are also coming due.
We had an agreement for at least 25k per month to cover some expenses paid from BofA.
Your lawyer has stated no division of assets unless we agree to your conditions to equalize income and I bear a greater portion of children costs.
I did not see proposal on how to pay bills that are coming due that you have been made aware of.
I donâ€™t see the cash in the other fidelity account, and have no access, so shall assume that is not being used to pay your bills that are due until the
disagreement on how to pay bills and who has access to what cash, what permissions are need to move it, pay bills is resolved.
You have demanded I request permission to move cash to pay bills. Assume same conditions placed on you.
Assuming your lawyer is aware you did not ask permission to pay your 31k for your Amex card.
